shortIntro.title: What This Game Needs to Run Smoothly
shortIntro.para1: Call of Duty Mobile (CODM) is one of the most optimized and feature-rich shooters available on mobile. To experience smooth gameplay, reduce lag, and enjoy high FPS modes, your device must meet certain minimum and recommended hardware requirements.
shortIntro.para2: Low-end devices can run CODM at 30 FPS with basic graphics, while mid-range and flagship devices can easily achieve 60–120 FPS depending on the chipset and in-game settings.

intro: Below are the official and community-verified minimum and recommended specifications required to run Call of Duty Mobile smoothly on Android devices.

minimum.CPU: Snapdragon 429 / Helio P22 / Kirin 655 or equivalent

faqIntroText: Here are the most frequently asked questions about Call of Duty Mobile performance, FPS modes, and device support.

faqList.question: Can COD Mobile run on 2GB RAM?
faqList.answer: Yes, but graphics remain on low settings and FPS is capped to ensure stability.

faqList.question: Does COD Mobile support 120 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, but only on selected Snapdragon flagship-level devices and some iPhones.

faqList.question: Is internet speed important?
faqList.answer: A stable 5–15 Mbps connection with low ping provides the best multiplayer experience.
